body.name: Supergoop! Glow Oil, 1.0 fl oz - SPF 50 PA++++ Hydrating, Nourishing Vitamin E Body Oil + Broad Spectrum Sunscreen Protection - With Marigold, Meadowfoam & Grape Seed Extracts
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 mins
features: GOOD TO GLOW - This lightweight & hydrating SPF 50 sunscreen body oil leaves skin glowing, without feeling greasy.
NOURISH & PROTECT SKIN - Our oxybenzone- & octinoxate-free body & facial oil contains antioxidant-rich ingredients like marigold, meadowfoam & grape seed extracts to nourish & protect skin.
FEEL-GOOD FORMULA - Supergoop! sunscreen oil absorbs easily, provides superior sun protection, & diminishes signs of UV damage.
GREAT FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Give your skin a brilliant glow with this lightweight oil. It’s water-resistant for 80 minutes & makes a great Vitamin E oil for face, body or any area exposed to the sun.
HOW TO APPLY - Spray & lather over your body each morning to hydrate & boost your skin’s natural glow. Use as a post-shower oil for ultra-moisturizing results.

reviews.reviewText: This product gives you a nice "glisten" along wit sunblock. My niece noticed right away and "Auntie! I want to glow like you! What is that?!" I'm the cool auntie :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shine Bright, Don't Fry - But You'll Need Your Shades!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies and gents, prepare to glow with the Supergoop! Glow Oil - SPF 50, a sunscreen that's like a disco ball for your skin! This product isn't just sun protection; it's a party waiting to happen on your skin. Here's the lowdown on this glitzy SPF 50 oil:Sunscreen with Sparkle: Sun protection doesn't have to be boring, and Supergoop! gets that. It's like they added a sprinkle of stardust to this sunscreen. You'll be shining so brightly that people might mistake you for the sun!Glow Goals: If you've ever dreamt of looking like a sun-kissed goddess without the sunburn, this is your ticket to that tropical fantasy. The shimmer in this oil makes you look like you just stepped off a beach in the Maldives.Broad Spectrum SPF 50: The sun protection factor is no joke – SPF 50 means business. It's like a bodyguard for your skin, shielding you from UV rays as you dazzle everyone with your luminosity.Vitamin E Nourishment: It's not just about looking good; this oil also nourishes your skin with vitamin E. It's like a beauty treatment and sunscreen in one, making sure your skin is as healthy as it is radiant.Perfect for a Beach Party: This oil is practically begging to be worn at the beach. It's like an open invitation to dance in the waves, and you won't need to worry about sunburn ruining your groove.Watch Out for Sunglasses: Here's where the fun begins – be prepared for your skin to shine so brightly that you might blind someone. It's like having your personal spotlight. Don't forget your shades; you're gonna need 'em!A Little Sticky: While the glow is fantastic, the oil can feel a bit sticky, especially on hot and humid days. It's like being wrapped in a cozy, albeit slightly clingy, blanket.Shake It Up: Don't forget to give it a good shake before applying. It's like mixing a cocktail – you want to make sure you get that shimmer evenly distributed.In conclusion, the Supergoop! Glow Oil - SPF 50 is like a disco party for your skin, complete with UV protection and shimmer galore. It's perfect for beach days and outdoor fun, but be ready to shine so brightly that you'll need your shades! A little stickiness aside, it's a four-star product that delivers on its promise to make you glow like a star!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Getting allergy tested... again...
reviews.reviewText: Objectively this product is lovely, it goes on easy, the smell is kinda strong at first but fades quickly. It provides really good protection and if you're thicc like me even eases tight rub considerably.The bad news.A month into using this product and I suddenly had a massive full body reaction out of no where. I've been skin swatch tested before with inconclusive results. But this was undeniably an allergic reaction. I thought at first it may have been heat rash, sunscreen in my pores, the heat wave that came through out of nowhere, wasn't out of the realm of possibility. Except heat rash is supposed to go away on its own with minimal intervention. Needless to say this didn't. 90+ hours of excruciatingly painful and itchy skin later I caved. I set out for the walk in clinich where it was decided that it was an allergic reaction, and that I'd need topical and oral steroids and to load up on antihistamines till it passed. Only just on the mend now.If your skin is sensitive and you really want to try it, I honestly think you should consider it. Before I had a reaction it was my favorite product in my routine. I love this stuff and I'd give anything other then compromising my health to keep using it.On the other hand if you're like me and have reactive skin and go get patch testing and it comes up negative. If that feels wrong to you, get a second opinion. It isn't worth it to spend your whole life guessing and checking when this is a possibility.Good luck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I actually tanned for the first time ever!
reviews.reviewText: I have very fair skin and it is very difficult for me to tan in the summer. It doesn’t matter if I’m wearing sunscreen or not. This summer I walked every day and definitely got plenty of sun but my skin never tanned. I started using this product about a month ago and about a week later I realized that I had a tan line. It was amazing and I can’t believe I’m just now finding out about this and I’m 44 years old! I know it doesn’t look that impressive in the pictures, but for this girl who never tans naturally, I’m ecstatic! I recently went on a cruise and then walked three Disney amusement parks and applied it only once each of the days during my vacation. I never got a sunburn, ever! I’ve been using it for a little while now and there is still plenty in the bottle. I apply about 3 to 4 pumps on each arm and each leg. And then some on my shoulders, chest and neck. I think it’s definitely worth the price you pay because it is lasting a long time. I am amazed by the results as well. It has zero smell and it goes on easily and absorbs well. I really don’t notice a discernible glow per se. Supergoop’s dry oil Glow Stick is definitely better if you want a more noticeable glow. That being said, this is a product I will always buy now. Love it!
